articles.title: Summer reads 2022: 8 nonfiction and fiction books about change, from Atomic Habits to the I Ching
articles.summary: With much of the world in turmoil, this list of nonfiction and fiction books will open your eyes to change in its many forms, whether channelled through magic, mayhem or a monkey king.

articles.title: Eileen Gu wins best breakthrough athlete at 2022 ESPYs, Weibo users delight after she uses Chinese, takes gran to awards
articles.summary: Winter Olympian claims another title after her double gold medal winning performance in Beijing, has fans swooning after taking grandmother to glitzy ceremony in Los Angeles.

articles.title: As the global economy recovers from Covid-19, the Russia-Ukraine conflict is banking’s ‘big black swan’ in 2022
articles.summary: Investors looking forward to a global economic recovery are now seeing a bumpy ride ahead

articles.title: Wimbledon 2022: Serena Williams is back
articles.summary: Williams makes her singles return after a year on the sidelines at a Wimbledon marred by the ban on Russia and Belarus players and the tournament’s loss of ranking points.

articles.title: 7 Korean actors heading to Hollywood in 2022: Blackpink’s Jennie and HoYeon Jung will act with Lily-Rose Depp, Cha Eun-woo has a gig with Rebel Wilson, and Park Seo-joon is in Disney’s The Marvels
articles.summary: From South Korea to Hollywood – which 7 Hallyu stars are set to appear in films this year in Tinseltown, and which US and global celebrities will they be acting with?

articles.title: Hong Kong Book Fair 2022 closes with total of 850,000 visitors, a slight increase from last year’s event
articles.summary: Number of attendees rose about 2.4 per cent from the 830,000 visitors at last year’s fair; customers spent an average of HK$879 at 2022 event.

articles.title: how to watch the Beijing 2022 Games in Hong Kong
articles.summary: Here’s our guide to when, where, and how you can watch all of the Winter Olympics action and support Hong Kong’s athletes.

articles.title: World’s 50 Best Restaurants 2022: Only 1 Asian restaurant in the top 20 as European fine dining dominates again
articles.summary: Led by Geranium in Copenhagen, European and Latin American restaurants took the top 5 spots in the latest ranking of the World’s 50 Best, with only one Asian restaurant in the top 20.

articles.title: China bond defaults hit US$20 billion in 2022, more than double last year’s total, as property developers teeter
articles.summary: Defaults by Chinese issuers have exceeded US$20 billion so far this year, compared with about US$9 billion for all of last year, with property developers accounting for most of the defaults.

articles.title: Jockey Club squeezes in 88 meetings despite late start to season 2022-23
articles.summary: Centenary Sprint Cup and Queen’s Silver Jubilee Cup to be run later next term, which begins on September 11

articles.title: 1.16 tonnes of drugs seized at Hong Kong airport in first half of 2022, double that of same period in 2021
articles.summary: Narcotics seized at airport during first six months of 2022 valued at HK$600 million.

articles.title: Good Eating Edit: Royal Hotels Hong Kong’s mooncakes take an inventive approach to the traditional delicacy, ideal for families this Mid-Autumn Festival 2022
articles.summary: As we approach the joyous Mid-Autumn Festival, we take a look at what mooncakes Royal Hotels Hong Kong are offering
